Posts.Content: panoramic wrote: I had a BMX five weeks ago and this week I went back to work. I imagined that I would be wearing prostheses most of the time but so far I can only tolerate them a few hours. I'm wondering how long it took other women before you could wear yours all day? I've read that some women can put them on and just forget about them but right now that is hard to imagine. Log in to post a reply
